# Product Requirements Document (PRD) Template

> Use this template to define the essential requirements for a small AI agent project. Keep it concise and focused on actionable details.

---

## 1. Project Overview
- **Project Name:**
- **Date:**
- **Prepared by:**
- **Stakeholders:**
- **Summary:**
  - Briefly describe the purpose and goals of the AI agent.

## 2. Problem Statement
- What problem or user need does this AI agent address?
- Why is this important?

## 3. Objectives & Success Criteria
- List the key objectives for the project.
- Define how success will be measured (KPIs, metrics, or acceptance criteria).

## 4. User Stories & Acceptance Criteria
- **User Story 1:**
  - As a [user type], I want [feature] so that [benefit].
  - **Acceptance Criteria:**
    - [ ] Criterion 1
    - [ ] Criterion 2
- **User Story 2:**
  - ...

## 5. Key Features & Requirements
- List the main features and requirements (functional & non-functional).
  - Feature 1:
  - Feature 2:

## 6. User Flow / Process Diagram (optional)
- Describe or sketch the main user journey or workflow.
- (Attach a simple diagram if helpful.)

## 7. Out of Scope
- List any features or requirements that are explicitly excluded.

## 8. Dependencies & Risks
- Note any dependencies (data, APIs, tools, etc.)
- List known risks or assumptions.

## 9. Backlog (Optional)
- Add a prioritized list of tasks or features for future sprints.

---

*Keep this document updated as the project evolves. Use it as a single source of truth for the team.*
